data.benefits: Scheme provides one-time capital expenditure (CAPEX) support of up to 25% of the eligible CAPEX expenditure, subject to a maximum ceiling of Rs. 5000 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All existing units engaged in IT/ITeS sector and running its operations within the state are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Eligible Unit means any existing unit having a minimum of 15 employees on its payroll. 
  2. Gross fixed capital investment must be less than Rs.25000 lakhs. 
  3. The expenditure incurred under GFCI towards the construction of new buildings shall be capped at Rs.3,000/sq. ft. of built-up area. 
  4. The annual CAPEX assistance disbursed shall be capped to the total annual operating expenditure of the eligible IT/ITeS Units.

data.nodal_agency: Department of Science and Technology, Government of Gujarat.
data.context: Gujarat is committed towards promoting faster and inclusive growth in the IT/ITeS Sector. The IT/ITeS Policy (2022-27) will enable an innovative ecosystem, establish a robust infrastructure and further develop the state's IT talent pool.
data.objective: To establish the state as a hub for innovation in Emerging and Advanced Technologies.
data.description:
Scheme provides the incentive support into two avenues : CAPEX and OPEX support. 

  • CAPEX :  All eligible IT/ITeS units are entitled to one-time CAPEX support of up to 25% of the eligible CAPEX expenditure, subject to a maximum ceiling of Rs.50000 lakhs. 
  • OPEX : All eligible IT/ITeS units are entitled to OPEX support of up to 15 per cent of the annual eligible OPEX expenditure, subject to a maximum ceiling of Rs. 20000 lakhs per year for a period of 5 years from the date of eligibility.
data.how_to_apply: The eligible applicants can apply through Incentive Management Portal : https://dstpolicy.gujarat.gov.in/
data.funding_facilitator: Department of Science and Technology, Government of Gujarat.
data.funding_mechanism:
The disbursement for CAPEX support will be in 20 equal quarterly instalments.
The disbursement for OPEX support will be in quarterly instalments.
data.highlights:
The Policy aims to achieve the following milestones in the next five years: 
1) Place Gujarat in the top five performing states of India in IT Sector 
2) Increase Gujarat's annual IT exports from Rs 3000 Crores to Rs 25000 Crores. 
3) Generate more than one lakh new IT/ITeS jobs in the State. 
4) Become the national leader in terms of world-class IT infrastructure, Data Centers and Innovation Centers in Emerging Technologies.
data.additional_info:
• Eligible CAPEX Expenditure: Includes capital expenditure under GFCI, stamp duty/registration fees for land/office space, and expenditure on renewable energy equipment for captive plants. Eligible OPEX Expenditure: 
  • Covers lease rentals (up to Rs. 50/sq. ft.), bandwidth and cloud rental expenses, power tariff costs, and patent application costs (up to Rs. 5 lakh per patent). 
  • Claim Period: IT/ITeS units can claim OPEX expenditures for 5 years from the start of commercial operations or in-principle approval, whichever is later.
